update T_HCJH
ND = #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
JHMC = #{jhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GSJHBH = #{gsjhbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FL = #{fl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
XDRQ = #{xdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
YQWCSJ = #{yqwcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HCRWSL = #{hcrwsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

YRLSL = #{yrlsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
WRLSL = #{wrlsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SHR = #{shr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHZT = #{shzt,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
XDR = #{xdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_HCJH set ND = #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JHMC = #{jhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GSJHBH = #{gsjhbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FL = #{fl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, XDRQ = #{xdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, YQWCSJ = #{yqwcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HCRWSL = #{hcrwsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YPFSL = #{ypfsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YRLSL = #{yrlsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WRLSL = #{wrlsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SHR = #{shr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHZT = #{shzt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, XDR = #{xdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SM = #{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NR = #{nr,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, XDRMC = #{xdrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHRMC = #{shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JHBH = #{jhbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CXWH = #{cxwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSRQ = #{ksrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLQSR = #{clqsr,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLZZR = #{clzzr,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PLAN_TYPE = #{planType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DJJG = #{djjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DJJGMC = #{djjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.jhxh GSJHBH, a.nd, a.jhmc, a.ccwh CXWH, a.ccqys HCRWSL, a.DJJG, b.name DJJGMC from GOV_NBCC_JH a LEFT JOIN SYS_ORGanization b ON a.djjg=b.id ORDER BY a.jhxh
select count(id) from T_HCJH WHERE GSJHBH = #{gsjhbh}
mapper.update:
update T_HCJH set
XDRQ = SYSDATE,
XDRQ = null,
XDR = #{userId}, XDRMC = #{userName} where ID = #{hcjhId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update T_HCJH set YRLSL = #{yrlsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WRLSL = (HCRWSL - #{yrlsl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) where ID = #{hcjhId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
